mapper.select: SELECT C.CONTENTID, A.AREACODE, A.READCOUNT, B.AREANAME, C.FIRSTIMAGE, C.TITLE FROM (SELECT AREACODE, MAX(READCOUNT) READCOUNT FROM YJ_PLACE WHERE CAT1 <> 'B02' GROUP BY AREACODE) A, (SELECT distinct AREACODE, AREANAME FROM YJ_AREACODE) B, YJ_PLACE C WHERE A.AREACODE = B.AREACODE AND A.READCOUNT = C.READCOUNT ORDER BY RAND()

SELECT A.CONTENTID, A.FIRSTIMAGE, A.READCOUNT, A.TITLE, A.AREACODE, A.SIGUNGUCODE, B.AREANAME, B.SIGUNGUNAME, A.CONTENTTYPEID, CASE C.CAT1NAME WHEN '인문(문화/예술/역사)' THEN '문화' WHEN '레포츠' THEN '레져' ELSE C.CAT1NAME END CAT1NAME FROM (
(SELECT CONTENTID, FIRSTIMAGE, READCOUNT, TITLE, AREACODE, SIGUNGUCODE, CONTENTTYPEID FROM YJ_PLACE WHERE
AREACODE = #{areacode} AND
CAT1 = #{item.name} ORDER BY READCOUNT DESC LIMIT #{item.value})
) A, YJ_AREACODE B, (SELECT DISTINCT CONTENTTYPEID, CAT1NAME FROM YJ_CATEGORYCODE) C WHERE A.AREACODE = B.AREACODE AND A.SIGUNGUCODE = B.SIGUNGUCODE AND A.CONTENTTYPEID = C.CONTENTTYPEID
